name: inkjs
description: A javascript port of inkle's ink scripting language (http://www.inklestudios.com/ink/)

scripts.build: grunt rollup:release && grunt rollup:release_min && grunt rollup:legacy && grunt rollup:legacy_min
scripts.prepublish: grunt rollup:release && grunt rollup:release_min && grunt rollup:legacy && grunt rollup:legacy_min

author: Yannick Lohse
